SqlRetryLogicOption.summary: Provides the retry logic parameters to create an instance of the class by methods.

remarks.format:
## Example The following sample declares a <xref:Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlRetryLogicOption> object that is configured to apply the retry logic for the error number **102** for a maximum of **5** times and **3** to **60** seconds gap time between each run. It will just work for the `Select` SQL statement if it assigns to a <xref:Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.RetryLogicProvider>.
[!code-csharp[SqlConfigurableRetryLogic_SqlRetryLogicOptions#1](~/../sqlclient/doc/samples/SqlConfigurableRetryLogic_SqlRetryLogicOptions.cs#1)]

NumberOfTries.summary: Sets the expected number of attempts when a **transient error** occurs.

DeltaTime.summary: Sets the gap interval time as a object.
DeltaTime.value: The upcomming gap time before next attempt to execute.

MinTimeInterval.summary: Sets the allowed minimum gap interval time as a object.
MinTimeInterval.value: The mininum upcomming gap time before next attempt to execute; the default value is **zero** and must be between 0 and 120 seconds.

MaxTimeInterval.summary: Sets the allowed maximum gap interval time as a object.
MaxTimeInterval.value: The maximum upcomming gap time before next attempt to execute; it must be between 0 and 120 seconds.

TransientErrors.summary: Sets the list of transient error numbers to apply the retry logic when happens.
TransientErrors.value: List of ; Set to use the internal list.

AuthorizedSqlCondition.summary: Sets a pre-retry validation function regarding the to skip the special SQL statements.
AuthorizedSqlCondition.value: The pre-retry validation delegate function; if the `CommandText` is authorized to retry the operation.
